spells.name: Adjuring Step
spells.description: You can move slowly and safely and still cast spells, until you move quickly, make an attack, or cast a harmful spell.

spells.name: Air Bubble
spells.description: Creates a small pocket of air around your head or an object.

spells.name: Damp Powder
spells.description: Ruins ammunition loaded in the targeted firearm.

spells.name: Fabricate Bullets
spells.description: Converts 1 pound of metal into ammunition.

spells.name: Illusion of Calm
spells.description: You appear to be standing still, even when you take some actions.

spells.name: Jury-Rig
spells.description: Removes the broken condition from the targeted object.

spells.name: Liberating Command
spells.description: Target makes an Escape Artist check as an immediate action and gains a bonus on it.

spells.name: Lock Gaze
spells.description: You compel the target to only look at you for the duration of the spell.

spells.name: Longshot
spells.description: Grants a +10-foot bonus to the range increment for any ranged weapon fired.

spells.name: Mirror Strike
spells.description: You may strike multiple opponents with a single attack.

spells.name: Negative Reaction
spells.description: Targeted creature may not positively influence anyone.

spells.name: Peacebond
spells.description: Locks a weapon in place on the target's body.

spells.name: Reinforce Armaments
spells.description: Temporarily mitigates the fragile quality in targeted weapon or armor.

spells.name: See Alignment
spells.description: Pick an alignment; in your sight, creatures and items with that alignment emit a ghostly radiance.

spells.name: Shock Shield
spells.description: A shield of force protects you until you dismiss it in an explosion of electricity.

spells.name: Unerring Weapon
spells.description: Grants a +2 bonus, +1 per four caster levels, on attack rolls to confirm a critical hit.

spells.name: Weaken Powder
spells.description: Targeted firearm's ammunition halves the firearm's range and imposes a –2 penalty on damage rolls.
